description: Taste the smoky flavours of Mexico with these delicious chicken burritos. Chipotle seasoning takes it to the next level!
name: Speedy Chipotle Chicken Burritos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 270g One Night in Mexico 6 pack tortillas with corn
35g One Night In Mexico smokey chipotle seasoning

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken and seasoning in a bowl. Stir until chicken is well coated.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken, stirring occasionally, for 10 to 12 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a bowl. Cover to keep warm.

Meanwhile, open tortilla packet and remove freshness sachet. Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook 1 tortilla at a time, for 10 seconds each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining tortillas.

Place coleslaw mix in a bowl, reserving dressing and noodle sachets. Add dressing to coleslaw. Toss to coat. Place noodles in a separate small bowl. Place 1 tortilla on a flat surface. Top the centre with a little coleslaw and chicken. Sprinkle with noodles. Fold up the bottom of the tortilla, then sides. Repeat with remaining tortillas. Serve.
